response.original_title: 範馬刃牙：息子、父、そして…
response.overview: In a world ruled by strength, Baki Hanma confronts the ultimate test: his father, Yujiro Hanma — the legendary Ogre. As father and son collide in a brutal, no-holds-barred fight, every punch, strike, and strategy pushes them to their absolute limits. This is not just a battle of fists, but a story of blood, legacy, and the struggle to surpass the impossible. The final clash will determine who truly embodies the title of “the strongest.”
response.tagline: “Father. Son. One ultimate battle that defines them both.”
response.title: Baki Hanma: Son, Father and…
